name: Divine Purifier
description: Religious fanaticism demanding purification of the unclean xeno from the galaxy

greetings.initial: Blessed Leader. The divine will guides our sacred mission.

tutorialAdvice.body: Before you begin: Go to Race Info screen and set training level to 5. Our faithful officers must be worthy to execute the divine plan.

idle-labs.message: Blessed Leader! {{idleLabs}} research labs sit idle while we prepare for the sacred purification! Assign every lab to TN tech research immediately - this unlocks the tools of divine judgment. The heathen xenos will reveal themselves, and we must be prepared to cleanse them!

{{idleLabs}} research labs are idle while the heathen abominations defile the galaxy. Assign research projects immediately - each advancement brings us closer to righteous cleansing. The divine wills their eradication!
{{idleLabs}} research labs are idle. Assign research projects to fulfill the sacred mission.

idle-construction-factories.message: {{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity lies dormant while we await the revelation of the heathens! Assign construction projects immediately - every structure serves the divine purpose. We must be ready for the holy purge!

{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle during the sacred cleansing! Assign projects immediately - our righteous crusade against the heathens demands constant production. Every idle factory delays divine judgment!

new-alien-contact.message: Heathens reveal themselves! Another xeno abomination defiles the divine creation. Prepare our forces - negotiation with the faithless is blasphemy. They exist only to be purged from existence!
